name: 32 Cans of Soup
description:
Play as a can of Reni's Tomato Soup as they duplicate themselves over  and over to create the greatest art piece they can ever think of - lots of cans of soup - and possibly square off against a boss, too!

Lovingly and somewhat accidentally crafted in the style of odd old webgames of yore for Paint Jam 2021.

Controls -
- WASD or Arrow Keys: Movement
- Z or L: Jump
- E: Die. This is actually important.
- R: Reset level.
